description:
Want to get to the next level with your affiliate marketing or online advertising? Then this course is exactly what you need!

In this course, you will discover how to use LinkTrackr to cloak and mask your affiliate links, track your sales and leads, optimize landing pages and get better ROI.

We also show you how to get a trial LinkTrackr account so you can follow along with this course and get to know the full capabilities of LinkTrackr.

Besides LinkTrackr, I also explain some basic concepts of affiliate marketing, how affiliate networks work, and how to optimize your affiliate earnings easily.
title: Affiliate Marketing & Ad Tracking with LinkTrackr
